price: Inni ni jedhe: “Nuti nama meeshaa keenya isa biratti argine malee fudhachuu irraa Rabbitti maganfanna. Dhugumatti, nuti yeroo san miidhaa hojjattoota.”
arabic: قَالَ مَعَاذَ ٱللَّهِ أَن نَّأۡخُذَ إِلَّا مَن وَجَدۡنَا مَتَٰعَنَا عِندَهُۥٓ إِنَّآ إِذٗا لَّظَٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qāla maʿādha al-lahi an nakhudha illā man wajadnā matāʿanā ʿindahu innā idhan laẓālimūna
